host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.
Limon and Costa Rica are very friendly places.  So, is Irvington, NJ, USA.

We love to provide excellent service and to excel in everything we do.

If we please you, tell many friends...If we miss our goal, please tell me..
:)  :)  :)

 I love to make new friends, good food, to explore new places and have fun.    
Please contact me if you are planning to explore NYC, NJ,  or Costa Rica.
 
We will have a great time.... Once you are here...You are family!

If you fly into Newark Airport (EWR) and staying at least 7 days,  Book an UBER or Lyft taxi and send photo of bill for refund (Up to $10).   

Also, I love to ski ...Poconos Skiing resort is 50 minutes away.  You can learn  to Ski ,Snowboard, or just slide down the slopes here!!!

Thanks!!!

neighborhood_overview:
Framed on the right by the Passaic River is the suburban neighborhood of Mount Pleasant-Lower Broadway. This community is ideal for commuters as it provides easy access to Interstate 280 and Highway 21, and it is situated just miles north of Downtown Newark. The suburb’s primarily residential streets are home to historic places of worship. Admire the impressive architecture of the community’s long-standing churches, including Saint Lucy's Church and the Archdiocese of Newark. Next, visit the city’s longest operating synagogue, the stunning Jewish Museum of New Jersey.

Moments away in Newark, renters in the Mount Pleasant-Lower Broadway area can enjoy exciting attractions including historic house museums, scenic parks, and a planetarium. To the west of the suburb is Branch Brook Park. Although good for recreation and fresh air year-round, this park really comes to life during the Cherry Blossom Festival.

host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.
Limon and Costa Rica are very friendly places.  So, is Irvington, NJ, USA.

We love to provide excellent service and to excel in everything we do.

If we please you, tell many friends...If we miss our goal, please tell me..
:)  :)  :)

 I love to make new friends, good food, to explore new places and have fun.    
Please contact me if you are planning to explore NYC, NJ,  or Costa Rica.
 
We will have a great time.... Once you are here...You are family!

If you fly into Newark Airport (EWR) and staying at least 7 days,  Book an UBER or Lyft taxi and send photo of bill for refund (Up to $10).   

Also, I love to ski ...Poconos Skiing resort is 50 minutes away.  You can learn  to Ski ,Snowboard, or just slide down the slopes here!!!

Thanks!!!

Why Suite:Jersey?

✔️Reputable & Highly Rated Host w/ Over 65 Reviews

✔Complimentary Breakfast (items) & Bottled Water Included, Based on # of Overnight Guests

✔Private Offi
neighborhood_overview:
The suite is located in the Weequahic neighborhood of Newark, NJ.

•》Just a short drive from Newark Penn Station, Prudential Center, NJ Performing Arts Center, MetLife Stadium, Nickolodean at Dream Mall, art and museums downtown.

•》Located less than two blocks from Weequahic Park, home to 311 acres of lush green space.

• 》Weequahic Park was designed by Olmstead, known for designing some of the world’s most famous parks that includes NYC’s Central Park and Brooklyn’s Prospect Park

•》The park has the world’s longest resilient-surfaced (100% recycled rubber) track which wraps around a beautiful 80 acre lake, with fountain and 18 hole golf course

•》Newark, NJ is rich in history, home to the state’s largest museum and the largest port on the east coast.
host_about:
myCitySuite is a boutique short-term rental company offering both vacation rentals and event spaces.

Born out of a love for people & fashion, a taste for comfort, & an eye for design, we aim to provide our guests with a unique experience, one that lasts.

Check out our newest location on Maps and social! @SuiteJersey

*Video Tour Available By Request

About the Founder:

Defina helps to sculpt the NYC skyline for a living. Essentially, she puts up the steel structure of buildings & bridges. This has created in her, a fixation on city skylines across the world!

From cross country road trips to snorkeling in Cuba, her love for discovering new places & new experiences keeps life exciting.

She enjoys meeting new people, music, interior design, education, & fashion. When she is not putting up a new building or repairing one of NY's iconic bridges, she is out exploring her interests or indulging in some quality time with her daughters.

From Defina and the myCitySuite team, we welcome you to create memories with purpose and experience travel with style!

host_about:
Hi there! Nice to meet you. I am a young black woman who has chosen to live her life fearfully and fully. I enjoy traveling whether solo or in group, enjoying local explorations as well as global ones, from within the States to the motherland of Africa. My goal in life is to travel to all the continents and truly experience local lifestyles and cultures.  I am a lover of arts, music, nature, and all things that bring meaning to life.  Life is just too short to not smile. I look forward to capturing smiles at your humble abode.  

"You didn't come here to be perfect. You already are. You came here to be gorgeously human."

Area transportation is convenient and fast. We are located 2 blocks from the Park Ave Train Station; 1 block from Dunkin Donuts, KFC, Dominican restaurant, laundromat, cleaners, and 2 delis; and 5 min walk to BRAVO Supermarket.

The space
A clean and peaceful space to work, study, read and explore the neighborhood and the famous Branch Brook Park designed by Central Park architect, William Olmsted.

The room has a large dress rack with hangars for hanging clothes and storage.

The stainless steel appliances in the kitchen are all clean and new.

Large living room for relaxing and embracing natural light streaming through the large window.

The
neighborhood_overview:
Newark is the Garden State’s largest metropolis and is located just 8 short miles from Manhattan. Air, water, roadway, railway, bike path, footbridge and subway, Newark offers every manner of transportation imaginable, providing access that’s unbelievable.

The transportation in the Roseville neighborhood is super convenient! After taking the light rail to Newark Penn Station 2 blocks away, its only a 20 minute commute to Midtown, NYC by train.

For entertainment, the New Jersey Performing Arts Center (NJPAC). Take on the largest premium outlet mall in the state, The Outlet Collection, Jersey Gardens, welcoming over 18 million visitors a year. Other activities include the Newark Museum; NHL New Jersey Devils; and NCAA Seton Hall Men’s Basketball that you can watch close by at the Prudential Center.

If you visit in the spring, experience the largest collection of cherry blossoms in the nation. Branch Brook Park blossoms with over 4,300 cherry trees, and h
host_about: You will find these Airbnbs to be bright, airy, and peaceful places for contemplation, studying, reading, working, and creating positive energy. There are lots of public transportation close by (trains and buses) as well as places to grab a bite. Don't hesitate to reach out: we look forward to hearing from you and hosting you!

name: Unit 2-Close to NYC and Newark Airport.
description:
Bayonne is a little peninsula located between Staten Island and Jersey City. This urban dwelling gives you all of the comforts and conveniences of being in the city. Everything is within walking distance with a short commute to New York City or the Statue of Liberty. Have your coffee/tea on the patio, enjoy a meal with your group in the dining room, or curl up on the sofa & watch a movie on the Amazon Firestick at the end of the night! Perfect for families and couples!

The space
Enjoy the city experience in the middle of town! I take COVID cleaning practices very seriously so you are safe while you are staying at my place! Relax in the living room after a long day watching a movie on the Amazon fire stick. Log into your Netflix, Hulu, or HBO and you'll feel right at home!

Guest access
You will have the entire apartment and back patio to yourself!

Other things to note
ABSOLUTELY NO PARTIES. Upstairs tenant has young
neighborhood_overview:
This is the city so everything is within walking distance! Supermarkets, 7/11 Store, and restaurants, all right here in Bayonne. The beautiful Bayonne Park is located just blocks away where you can find a track, playgrounds, nature ponds with turtles, and places to just sit and relax. The Light Rail train is just one block away from the apartment. 3 short stops and your at Liberty State Park! Take a look at Google Maps to get an idea of just how Bayonne is nestled in the middle of it all!
Bayonne is a city with free public parking. Parking can be difficult but not impossible.
host_about: Enjoy your own apartment, in the middle of my city with everything you need just steps away.  There is a small supermarket across the street, a train station one block away that leads to Jersey City (where you can hop on the PATH or Ferry to New York City), and great restaurants.  This is a great place to come to be close to NYC without paying NY prices.  I’m 8.8 miles from Times Square, 14 miles from LaGuardia Airport, 18 miles to Kennedy Airport, 3.6 miles from Newark Airport, 5.8 miles to World Trade Center and downtown NYC, and 3.5 miles to Statue of Liberty.  Safe neighborhood too!  Great for business trips, and vacationers!  If you want to be in NYC and can afford to pay for it then stay in NYC, but if your on a budget, and don't mind a short travel to get to NYC then come stay with me!

description:
This brand new apartment features an open concept living and modern furnishings with high ceiling and abundant of natural lights. Relax in the family room with a movie and cook up a family meal in the kitchen. Located on a quiet one-way street, with close proximity to EWR & NYC, makes this the perfect home away from home when visiting the area.

* There is a noise monitoring device in the dining area and exterior cameras facing the driveway and side hallway

The space
Welcome to your home away from home in Bayonne, NJ!

There are a few steps leading up to the front entrance. There are three bedrooms total: Two bedrooms each has a king bed and a twin over twin bunk bed, one of them is an en-suite. The last bedroom has a king sized bed and a crib. There's a day bed with trundle bed and a comfy sofa in the living room. Another full bathroom in the hallway. There are also a desk and chair that makes WFH easy.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
Only a few blocks easy walk to the 34th light rail station, bus stops, the C-town supermarket and the biggest park in Bayonne (Stephen R. Gregg Park).
This quiet space is sitting on a one-way street with little local traffic and mostly filled with long term families.

name: Luxury Mupani Full Suite  @MushaindoroHS
description:
Ambiance & serenity defines our Mupani suite. We don't do ordinary at Mushaindoro Hospitality Suites. Our self-catering Southern African B&B offers colorful contemporary art design, beautiful home decor, with full service amenities. It's vibrant yet soothing and comfortable. Mupani suite is on 2nd floor, 1 Full bed; 48" SmartTV; high speed Wi-Fi; cable; housekeeping; free laundry facilities. We are 5 starts for cleanliness, thoughtful touches, comfort, value for money, convenience. Book now.

The space
Thanks for considering Mushaindoro Hospitality Suites, the Jewel in African Hospitality. I hope you choose to stay with us and we promise your stay with us will exceed your expectations. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic we have put in place new health & safety precautions for the benefit of all guests, please read before confirming your reservation to comply with our health measures. In addition, we supply guests with a mask, latex gloves, sanitizers, disinfectant and
neighborhood_overview:
Mushaindoro Hospitality suites are a perfect traveler's location for 1) self-catering in house & Restaurants - fine & casual dining; 2) Recreation & Entertainment; and 3) Public transportation to NYC, Newark Liberty International Airport (with access to shuttle services to JFK & LaGuardia); major shopping malls (Jersey Gardens, Short Hills & Livingston); and the major Universities of NJ (Rutgers, Seaton Hall, NJIT, University Hospital, Kean and Montclair Universities). In addition, our photos are Airbnb verified which means, what you see is exactly what our luxury suites offer.
Our restaurants comprise of high-end multicultural restaurants of Maplewood and South Orange villages. Coffee houses, diners, ethnic and gourmet restaurants offer everything from morning coffee and bagels to late night cafe latte. We also have a variety of exotic fast food take-out establishments that deliver like sushi, Chinese, Italian, Ethiopian, Mexican, Caribbean cuisine, Papa John’s, Dominos and many
host_about: Welcome to Mushaindoro Hospitality Suites, the Jewel in African Hospitality. I am your host and proprietor Tendai.  Originally from Zimbabwe, Mushaindoro Hospitality Suites gives me the opportunity to share my traditional Shona culture, blended with my acquired American experiences.  Our suites are names after Shona trees, mostly wild fruit trees that grow in this southern African savanna region of  the continent.  Having traveled a lot, I know what I love about a great stay, therefore I strive to offer my guests an authentic memorable homespitality experience. Our motto is  WE are the jewel  in African Hospitality and we make the best efforts to meet our guests' expectations. I look forward to meeting and hosting you.

name: Open Space-Pop Up Shops!
description:
No overnight stays. This is a 10 hour rental and must be over by 10pm. A beautiful space with an exposed brick wall and elegant black tin ceilings. This space also features a graffiti art wall for a modern urban feel. There are slot walls and a counter that make it perfect for a pop up event. Hangers are available. Open floor space - get creative. Furniture can be moved to suit your needs.

The space
Ground level entrance- store. Showroom and backroom can be used to store items or furniture you don't want visible for your sale.

Guest access
Store room space, back room, back yard area. Smoking allowed in back yard area.

Other things to note
No Smoking inside. Space should be cleaned and vacated by 10pm. Your cleaning fee will be refunded if you clean up after your event and it is the way you found it.
neighborhood_overview: Diverse urban area. Located on the Main Street across from 24 hour markets, and a few doors down from a grocery store.  Local dining options within walking distance and many places to order food from.  One block away from light rail train station.
host_about: Enjoy your own apartment, in the middle of my city with everything you need just steps away.  There is a small supermarket across the street, a train station one block away that leads to Jersey City (where you can hop on the PATH or Ferry to New York City), and great restaurants.  This is a great place to come to be close to NYC without paying NY prices.  I’m 8.8 miles from Times Square, 14 miles from LaGuardia Airport, 18 miles to Kennedy Airport, 3.6 miles from Newark Airport, 5.8 miles to World Trade Center and downtown NYC, and 3.5 miles to Statue of Liberty.  Safe neighborhood too!  Great for business trips, and vacationers!  If you want to be in NYC and can afford to pay for it then stay in NYC, but if your on a budget, and don't mind a short travel to get to NYC then come stay with me!

neighborhood_overview:
Some of the reviews about the neighborhood are old.
The area is safe. There are few bad folks like in every big city.
The area is being revitalized.
People around here are friendly. Don't be surprised if someone says "Good morning" or tries to help you.
Take a tour around Irvington by doing a search on "City of Irvington tax collector NJ". You will see a street view map. Please click on it and take a virtual tour.

Getting around is easy since there are many options. This is a central location with easy access to all major highways and public transportation.
Please do a search using 143 19th Ave, Irvington, NJ as your starting point.
host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.
Limon and Costa Rica are very friendly places.  So, is Irvington, NJ, USA.

We love to provide excellent service and to excel in everything we do.

If we please you, tell many friends...If we miss our goal, please tell me..
:)  :)  :)

 I love to make new friends, good food, to explore new places and have fun.    
Please contact me if you are planning to explore NYC, NJ,  or Costa Rica.
 
We will have a great time.... Once you are here...You are family!

If you fly into Newark Airport (EWR) and staying at least 7 days,  Book an UBER or Lyft taxi and send photo of bill for refund (Up to $10).   

Also, I love to ski ...Poconos Skiing resort is 50 minutes away.  You can learn  to Ski ,Snowboard, or just slide down the slopes here!!!

Thanks!!!

FASTER than subway ride from PLEASE KEEP READING ⬇️ Brooklyn or Queens. 5 minutes from EWR Airport, Kean University, Beth Israel Hospital. 15 minutes from Prudential Center & Harrison Red Bull Arena. Our promise: EASY automated self-check-in, clean, safe & we NEVER cancel :-)

The space

Why Book With Me.
As a traveler, I believe that one shouldn't spend lots of money on a hotel or room. Instead, most of the budget should go to the ADVENTURE itself. I also believe that affordability shouldn't compromise comfort. This is why I offer the listings wit
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is really quiet, safe and diverse (American, Portuguese, Brazilian and Latin American). Trust me, you will need a nice and quiet place to rest after you are done exploring New York City. There's a Walgreens 2 blocks  from the house to buy basic items and a Dunkin Donuts for a quick breakfast.
host_about:
Let me start by saying, thank you for considering our listings.

We are passionate about the guest experience. We stay in each listing from time to time so we can feel what our guests feel and make sure our guests have the best experience possible. Our improvement to do list is never ending. We take the time to address all of our guests concerns and make their stay as comfortable as possible.

Our company, BESTCITYROOM, com has its own website, IG @ BESTCITYROOM and (Hidden by Airbnb) page BESTCITYROOM where you can find more information about us and reach us for host consulting, Airbnb investments, monetizing Timeshares and doing Airbnb remotely worldwide.

We are always on the move and only a few guests get to know us personally. However, if you would to meet us we will make sure to have you down in our calendar :-)

We have been to many countries and endless cities. We have travel for over 20 years, fluent on 6 languages. There's a big probability we have been to where you come from and have gone where you going next, so feel free to ask for traveling advice.

Thank you for your business and keep traveling/exploring until its your time to rest.

name: Spacious Cozy 1 BD 30min from NYC
description:
This cozy spacious 1 bedroom is located just 30 minutes outside of Midtown NYC by train. New Jersey Transit is located on the same block and just a short 5 minute walk away. The train will take you straight to Penn Station New York on 34th St.

This apartment is perfect for someone looking to be near the city without having the hassle of parking or overpriced tiny hotel rooms.

Enjoy my in-unit amenities including professional recording equipment, steam room, and stationary bike!
neighborhood_overview: Predominantly black neighborhood that is being developed rapidly. They're currently rebuilding the main shopping center next to the train station and have built up two new apartment buildings on my block in the last two years. Many people are finding this neighborhood to be a hidden gem considering it's convenient commute into the city while still having a semi-suburban feel. There are many different cultures in my neighborhood especially Haitian and African cultures which means the local cuisine is poppin! You'll see lots of people walking their dogs and the occasional street parade on my block (which you'll be able to see right from my living room and bedroom) for major holidays such as Memorial Day or Labor Day.
host_about: Hi, I'm Whitney! I'm a pretty relaxed traveler that is mostly looking for good food, great wine, and to relax with a view. I sometimes travel with my 9 year old Chiweenie, Sasha, who is more cat-like than dog. She rarely barks unless around other dogs that are barking (her pack instinct kicks in), and is usually snuggled in the comfiest seat cushion of the house. I am a very responsible guest. I previously worked in hospitality and office management, so I understand the importance of respecting other people's property and space. I am very honored to be welcomed into your home, thank and God bless.

host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.
Limon and Costa Rica are very friendly places.  So, is Irvington, NJ, USA.

We love to provide excellent service and to excel in everything we do.

If we please you, tell many friends...If we miss our goal, please tell me..
:)  :)  :)

 I love to make new friends, good food, to explore new places and have fun.    
Please contact me if you are planning to explore NYC, NJ,  or Costa Rica.
 
We will have a great time.... Once you are here...You are family!

If you fly into Newark Airport (EWR) and staying at least 7 days,  Book an UBER or Lyft taxi and send photo of bill for refund (Up to $10).   

Also, I love to ski ...Poconos Skiing resort is 50 minutes away.  You can learn  to Ski ,Snowboard, or just slide down the slopes here!!!

Thanks!!!

My wife and I are originally from Trinidad and Tobago, a country in the Caribbean known for having the happiest and most friendliest people in the world.

host_about:
Recent Harvard Graduate class of 2018 :) Master of Finance 

I am very down to earth, very friendly and always happy to help in any way that I can to make your stay as comfortable as possible in any one of my properties. I am only a message away :).

I was born and raised in Elizabeth, NJ and know the area very well, this is where most of my listings are located 5 minutes from EWR Newark Liberty International Airport. 

At the moment I split my time between New Jersey and Boston, Massachusetts and focusing more on being an entrepreneur rather than finding work. I truly love the Airbnb concept and hope to have listings all over the world some day :). I also have a car rental business that works on a similar platform as Airbnb called TURO. 

I am very interested in all Asian cultures and love meeting people from that part of the world. I hope to live there some day.  My family is from Ecuador and I have double citizenship for United States and Ecuador.

The space
The room is very clean and cozy. It can accommodate 1 person comfortably. host_about:
Recent Harvard Graduate class of 2018 :) Master of Finance 

I am very down to earth, very friendly and always happy to help in any way that I can to make your stay as comfortable as possible in any one of my properties. I am only a message away :).

I was born and raised in Elizabeth, NJ and know the area very well, this is where most of my listings are located 5 minutes from EWR Newark Liberty International Airport. 

At the moment I split my time between New Jersey and Boston, Massachusetts and focusing more on being an entrepreneur rather than finding work. I truly love the Airbnb concept and hope to have listings all over the world some day :). I also have a car rental business that works on a similar platform as Airbnb called TURO. 

I am very interested in all Asian cultures and love meeting people from that part of the world. I hope to live there some day.  My family is from Ecuador and I have double citizenship for United States and Ecuador.

Recent Harvard Graduate class of 2018 :) Master of Finance

I truly love the Airbnb concept and hope to have listings all over the world some day :). I also have a car rental business that works on a similar platform as Airbnb called TURO. 

I am very interested in all Asian cultures and love meeting people from that part of the world. I hope to live there some day.  My family is from Ecuador and I have double citizenship for United States and Ecuador.

neighborhood_overview:
Some of the reviews about the neighborhood are old.
The area is safe. There are few bad folks like in every big city.
The area is being revitalized.
People around here are friendly. Don't be surprised if someone says "Good morning" or tries to help you.
Take a tour around Irvington by doing a search on "City of Irvington tax collector NJ". You will see a street view map. Please click on it and take a virtual tour.

Getting around is easy since there are many options. This is a central location with easy access to all major highways and public transportation.
Please do a search using “143 19th Ave, Irvington, NJ” as your starting point.
host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.
Limon and Costa Rica are very friendly places.  So, is Irvington, NJ, USA.

We love to provide excellent service and to excel in everything we do.

If we please you, tell many friends...If we miss our goal, please tell me..
:)  :)  :)

 I love to make new friends, good food, to explore new places and have fun.    
Please contact me if you are planning to explore NYC, NJ,  or Costa Rica.
 
We will have a great time.... Once you are here...You are family!

If you fly into Newark Airport (EWR) and staying at least 7 days,  Book an UBER or Lyft taxi and send photo of bill for refund (Up to $10).   

Also, I love to ski ...Poconos Skiing resort is 50 minutes away.  You can learn  to Ski ,Snowboard, or just slide down the slopes here!!!

Thanks!!!

name: Bayonne; NYC, Newark Airport & Cruise Line
description:
The room is cozy and comfortable. The town of Bayonne is a very nice and safe neighborhood, close transportation to NYC, Jersey City and Hoboken, about a 7 minute walk to the Lightrail Train, or a 5 minute walk to buses. Nice places to eat and shop, all in walking distance along Broadway. There's also a 24/7 Quick Check around the corner with a free ATM machine. There are also nice parks too. If you drive, you can find other shopping areas, such as Walmart, Lowes, Lidls and Costco.

The space
I don't think my home is much different from the rest, but because I decided to buy a home later in life, I am gradually making strides to improve my home by updating one thing at a time, which to me begins on the inside.

Guest access
Guests have access to their private room with a lock on the door, the shared bathroom, the kitchen for light cooking, and the dining room.

Other things to note
There’s a little old fat doggy nam
neighborhood_overview: Bayonne is a centrally located city with a nice diversity of people and cultures that shows in the restaurants and shops around town mostly on the city's main strip, Broadway.  Bayonne has a few beautiful parks to check out and also has accessible public transportation to New York City and good access to highways (Route 440, Interstate 78 and NJ Turnpike).   There are also box stores on Route 440 such as Costco, Stop & Shop, Walmart, Lowes, and other stores in the making such as Lidl, Starbucks, CVS, etc.
host_about: I am an  easy going and down to earth person that enjoys being around others.  I am very personable and get along well with people.  I am fully vaccinated.  I have a daughter and grandson.  From a large family. I also have a small dog and a few rescue cats.

description:
A private bedroom with shared bathroom, kitchen and living room. Very cozy atmosphere. Safe neighborhood although it may appear sketchy. Our house is a diamond in the rough for people on a budget so do not hesitate to book...you will be pleasantly surprised! Transportation to Newark Penn Station is available by bus which takes 15 minutes. Room includes TV.

The space
Private room with shared bathroom, kitchen, living room. Very cozy atmosphere. Don't judge a book by its cover. The neighborhood may appear sketchy but it is safe and VERY quiet. Our house is a diamond in the rough for people on a budget so do not hesitate to book...you will be pleasantly surprised! This up and coming area is undergoing redevelopment by property investors and will soon be revamped. Transportation to Newark Penn Station is available by bus which takes 15 minutes and the bus stop is steps away on the corner of the street.

Living room, kitchen an
neighborhood_overview:
Dont judge a book by the cover, neighborhood may appear sketchy but it is safe and
VERY quiet. Don’t be intimidated by some abandoned houses and “homeless”people (they are harmless) in this up and coming area which is undergoing redevelopment by property investors and will soon be revamped. Transportation to Newark Penn Station is available by bus which takes 15 minutes and the bus stop is steps away on the corner of the street. Do not listen to Taxi or Uber Drivers regarding safety issues in our area. It is exaggerated and untrue these are issues of the past and racist comments. A lot of things have changed for the better in Irvington and Newark. Plenty of restaurants, grocery stores and pharmacy within walking distance.

host_about:
Recent Harvard Graduate class of 2018 :) Master of Finance 

I am very down to earth, very friendly and always happy to help in any way that I can to make your stay as comfortable as possible in any one of my properties. I am only a message away :).

I was born and raised in Elizabeth, NJ and know the area very well, this is where most of my listings are located 5 minutes from EWR Newark Liberty International Airport. 

At the moment I split my time between New Jersey and Boston, Massachusetts and focusing more on being an entrepreneur rather than finding work. I truly love the Airbnb concept and hope to have listings all over the world some day :). I also have a car rental business that works on a similar platform as Airbnb called TURO. 

I am very interested in all Asian cultures and love meeting people from that part of the world. I hope to live there some day.  My family is from Ecuador and I have double citizenship for United States and Ecuador.

name: Private 1 bedroom apartment with separate entrance
description:
Comfortable and spacious one bedroom apartment with separate entrance located on the ground (basement) level of our historic home in South Orange, New Jersey. South Orange is a vibrant commuter town located 25 minutes by train from New York Penn Station and 15 minutes from Newark Airport. Located 1 block from Seton Hall University. Off street parking is available.

The space
Stylish one bedroom basement apartment with a separate entrance located on the basement level of our home. A large living room area has a sectional sofa, a dining area and a flat-screen TV. A separate bedroom has a brand new king sized bed with a Nectar mattress. The sofa bed in the living room has a new memory foam mattress and pulls out to a queen-size bed. The full bath has a stall shower. There is a table with seating for four people for meals and working. The galley kitchen is well stocked and has all necessary equipment (full-size stove/oven, microwave, toaster, and coffeepot). Ther
neighborhood_overview:
South Orange is a vibrant New York City Commuter town with a direct 25 minute train into Penn Station, mid-town Manhattan. We are less than a mile from the South Orange train station and only 20 minutes away from the Newark Airport.

In addition to its proximity to New York City, the Village of South Orange has much to offer including many unique shops, restaurants, pubs, a movie theater and its own Performing Arts Center. South Orange is also home to Seton Hall University which is just one block from our home.
host_about: We are avid travelers and enjoy hosting and exchanging stories with fellow travelers. We have been home exchanging and hosting for many years so have come to love the experience of traveling while staying in a real home.  We have made many friends throughout the world through our travels.
neighbourhood: South Orange, New Jersey, United States

name: Cozy Apt near JC & NYC (10 mins to Staten Island/20 mins to Bklyn) • 5 mins to Cruise Port • Pet Friendly! • Private Parking
description:
This artsy and spacious apartment is located in the up and coming town of Bayonne. Centrally located, you'll have easy access to the bustling social scene in downtown Jersey City, an exciting trip to Liberty Science Center and Liberty State Park, the hip night life of Hoboken, connections to NYC - just minutes from Staten Island and Brooklyn. Within walking distance from local eateries, boutiques, and entertainment. Parking is included with your stay and pets and children are always welcome!

The space
This casual and spacious unit features a large bedroom with a super comfy California King sized bed. TVs in both the living room and bedroom are equipped with Roku streaming device so you can access your favorite subscription. We offer super fast Verizon wifi, board games for fun night in, complimentary coffee, tea, and wine for your enjoyment.
There's an extra fold-out rollaway bed to maximize occupancy for 3 guests, high chair, and pack and play for
neighborhood_overview:
Conveniently located in the up and coming city of Bayonne, you're literally within walking distance from everything you could possibly need. Try out a delicious breakfast at a popular bistro just down the block or the bagel shop across the street. A few blocks down visit the best diner in town, go bowling, or grab a coffee (light and sweet of course) at DD. Nearby shopping center includes a Walgreens pharmacy, international food market, and several fast food options.
Buses to and from NYC are just steps from the apartment, as well as light rail station nearby to local attractions and shopping mall. By car you're just a few minutes from Newark International Airport, Liberty State Park and Liberty Science Center, American Dream Mall and the Mills at Jersey Gardens Outlet Mall. Hop on the NJ Turnpike just a few blocks away to any destination in North or South Jersey. Enjoy a day trip to the Jersey Shore!

host_about:
Recent Harvard Graduate class of 2018 :) Master of Finance 

I am very down to earth, very friendly and always happy to help in any way that I can to make your stay as comfortable as possible in any one of my properties. I am only a message away :).

I was born and raised in Elizabeth, NJ and know the area very well, this is where most of my listings are located 5 minutes from EWR Newark Liberty International Airport. 

At the moment I split my time between New Jersey and Boston, Massachusetts and focusing more on being an entrepreneur rather than finding work. I truly love the Airbnb concept and hope to have listings all over the world some day :). I also have a car rental business that works on a similar platform as Airbnb called TURO. 

I am very interested in all Asian cultures and love meeting people from that part of the world. I hope to live there some day.  My family is from Ecuador and I have double citizenship for United States and Ecuador.

name: Luxury Suite near EWR/NYC
description:
This is a beautiful luxury private suite located in a prime location of Elizabeth, NJ that facilitates transportation to NYC and Newark Liberty International Airport.

The space
This luxury Suite has a queen sized pillow top mattress dressed with top of the line Polo Ralph Lauren Bed Sheets and linens along with 5 Plush Pillows. This suite has a spacious closet with hangers. Private bathroom and shower with all essentials provided. Smart TV with Netflix, Amazon Prime, VUDU and more. Desk for laptop working space. USB port on the lamp, and super high speed FIOS Verizon Internet. Guests can access kitchen, living room, balcony, Washer and Dryer.

Guest access
Kitchen and everything in there ( please clean up after yourself), living room, balcony, and all common areas: cardio gym (open 24 hours), weight training gym (open 7am- 11pm), business/study room (open 24 hours), recreation/lounge room (open 24 hours).

Other things to note<
neighborhood_overview: In this neighborhood you will see that you are close to many convenient locations. Restaurants (Italian, Portuguese, Chinese, South American, Pizzeria, fast food) Parks, Bakery, Liquor Store, Bars/clubs, Super Markets, Hair Salon, Billiards, Walgreens and more!! The Airport is 5 minutes away and lots of easy access to public transportation to reach NYC. There is lots of diversity and is a safe place to be.
host_about:
Recent Harvard Graduate class of 2018 :) Master of Finance 

I am very down to earth, very friendly and always happy to help in any way that I can to make your stay as comfortable as possible in any one of my properties. I am only a message away :).

I was born and raised in Elizabeth, NJ and know the area very well, this is where most of my listings are located 5 minutes from EWR Newark Liberty International Airport. 

At the moment I split my time between New Jersey and Boston, Massachusetts and focusing more on being an entrepreneur rather than finding work. I truly love the Airbnb concept and hope to have listings all over the world some day :). I also have a car rental business that works on a similar platform as Airbnb called TURO. 

I am very interested in all Asian cultures and love meeting people from that part of the world. I hope to live there some day.  My family is from Ecuador and I have double citizenship for United States and Ecuador.

name: The Maplewood House -5br w huge yard by NYC
description:
Make some memories in this large family-friendly house with huge backyard, just a short 35min train ride into NY Penn or 15 mile drive to the Holland Tunnel for downtown Manhattan (Tribeca).

The space
3 floor, 5 bedroom house plus basement. Perfect for families.
neighborhood_overview:
Set atop a hill on a picturesque tree lined street between Memorial and Maplecrest parks, in the pretty and vibrant city suburb of Maplewood, NJ. Just a short ride from Manhattan!

On “Rainbow Crosswalk” Avenue in the Tuscan section of Maplewood. Walking distance (one block) to the park, shops, library, restaurants and 3/4 of a mile to the train station (NJT Essex line serving NY Penn) and all that Maplewood Village offers.

20mins Uber/drive to the Holland Tunnel for downtown Manhattan. Or take the PATH in from nearby Jersey City and Hoboken.

The space
Are you planning a trip for the family or with a big group of friends to New York, New Jersey, or nearby? Our clean, stylish, and warmhearted place is on your wishlist. Below is a detailed description of our space, and if you are in a hurry, we have covered all the basics in the Summary; feel free to skip over and start booking! :-) You are always welcome to message me if you have any additional questions! LOC
neighborhood_overview:
Bayonne is ranked one of the safest towns in the New York metropolitan area. It is only 10 miles (16 KM) from Downtown Manhattan. Life typically centers around the neighborhood church and ethnic cuisine, and children play in the streets. Feel safe and relaxed during your visit. Access Bayonne is so easy; the NJ Turnpike highway entrance is 1.5 miles away and takes you into Manhattan via Holland Tunnel in no time! Driving would not be necessary since there are THREE Light rail stations in Bayonne!
Our apartment is located next to the busiest street of Bayonne, where you can find two convenient stores, Quick Chek and 7-11, that are open 24 hours, and one supermarket with all you need for a home cook meal, all within a 2-5 minutes walking distance. There are also plenty of restaurants to choose from; the local favorite Mexican/Spanish restaurant “El Aguila Dorada” is right around the corner! Pizza is also Bayonne’s specialty; you won’t regret getting s slice (or two) from La Guardiol

host_about:
Hey, if you are reading this post you are maybe interested about booking my place:). You need to know me better. 
I am an  easy going and friendly person with elevated interpersonal skills. I am originally from Senegal "Pays du Teranga"(Country of Hospitality). The well-being of my guests is very important to me; I take care of their space as I was living there. I make sure you are not missing anything. I thing people should feel at home when they stay with me. As a guest I ensure not to burden my host and make myself helpful by keeping the space clean as I would do in my house. My kids always laugh when I make the bed and put things in order when we are checking out of a hotel. I enjoy and find ways putting people at ease regardless of the situation..
The things are like the most is interacting with family, doing work around the house (gardening, painting, decorating...) I love to travel and discover new places, food and music...
My motto: "Hakuna Matata". 
No Worries. Situation arrises, no stress about it & find a solution.
You will have a wonderful sejour at my place.

host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.

name: *Private 2BR Bloomfield Apartment* 8 mins to Train
description:
Welcome to your home away from home!

Our freshly renovated 2-bedroom apartment features a brand new kitchen and renovated bathroom. The Master Bedroom houses a king-sized bed. Our cozy second bedroom features a twin-sized bed and a dresser.

Unwind on the comfortable sofa w/ chaise in front of the 55" TV. Or, if weather permits, relax in the bright sun porch, or alongside the fire pit in our side yard near the grill!

To access NYC, we are an 8 minute walk from the Watsessing Train Station!

The space
Spacious, immaculately renovated 2 bedroom apartment in the Watsessing area of Bloomfield. Located an 8 minute walk from NJ Transit direct (on weekdays; with a transfer on weekends) into Manhattan (Penn Station) via the Watsessing Ave Station--be in Manhattan in 30-40 minutes! Private entrance to the rear of the building. Off street parking included.

Located less than a mile from Downtown Bloomfield -- and a short drive fr
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the heart of Bloomfield's Watsessing neighborhood, we are located a short stroll from Watsessing Park.

NJ Transit's Watsessing Ave Station is an 8 minute walk and provides access to New York Penn Station (and much of New Jersey). On weekdays, the trains run direct into Manhattan. On weekends, the same train takes you to NYC by way of a transfer at Newark Broad Street.

Bloomfield is home to many well-regarded establishments, including some local favorites:

- Bloomfield Steak & Seafood House (Steak & Seafood)
- Mangia Organica (American / Italian)
- Bucco (Italian)
- Injera (Ethiopian)
- Belmont Tavern (Italian, located in Belleville)
- Aki Asian House (Japanese / Sushi)

You can find anything and everything you're looking for nearby in Bloomfield, Montclair, and The Oranges!

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is really quiet, safe and diverse (American, Portuguese, Brazilian and Latin American). host_about:
Let me start by saying, thank you for considering our listings.

We are passionate about the guest experience. We stay in each listing from time to time so we can feel what our guests feel and make sure our guests have the best experience possible. Our improvement to do list is never ending. We take the time to address all of our guests concerns and make their stay as comfortable as possible.

Our company, BESTCITYROOM, com has its own website, IG @ BESTCITYROOM and (Hidden by Airbnb) page BESTCITYROOM where you can find more information about us and reach us for host consulting, Airbnb investments, monetizing Timeshares and doing Airbnb remotely worldwide.

We are always on the move and only a few guests get to know us personally. However, if you would to meet us we will make sure to have you down in our calendar :-)

We have been to many countries and endless cities. We have travel for over 20 years, fluent on 6 languages. There's a big probability we have been to where you come from and have gone where you going next, so feel free to ask for traveling advice.

Thank you for your business and keep traveling/exploring until its your time to rest.

neighborhood_overview:
Some of the reviews about the neighborhood are old.
The area is safe. There are few bad folks like in every big city.
The area is being revitalized.
People around here are friendly. Don't be surprised if someone says "Good morning" or tries to help you.
Take a tour around Irvington by doing a search on "City of Irvington tax collector NJ". You will see a street view map. Please click on it and take a virtual tour.

Getting around is easy since there are many options. This is a central location with easy access to all major highways and public transportation.

host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.
Limon and Costa Rica are very friendly places.  So, is Irvington, NJ, USA.

We love to provide excellent service and to excel in everything we do.

If we please you, tell many friends...If we miss our goal, please tell me..
:)  :)  :)

 I love to make new friends, good food, to explore new places and have fun.    
Please contact me if you are planning to explore NYC, NJ,  or Costa Rica.
 
We will have a great time.... Once you are here...You are family!

If you fly into Newark Airport (EWR) and staying at least 7 days,  Book an UBER or Lyft taxi and send photo of bill for refund (Up to $10).   

Also, I love to ski ...Poconos Skiing resort is 50 minutes away.  You can learn  to Ski ,Snowboard, or just slide down the slopes here!!!

Thanks!!!

name: Your perfect hub for your New York City Adventure.
description:
Brand new, renovated, fully furnished modern top floor suite A, in a two suite home. 2 bedrooms, one full bath, central air, cable, internet, Sonos, full kitchen, washer/dryer in unit, bar, parking, public transport to Manhattan right out the front door by bus or light rail. Less than 40 mins to World Trade Center or South Ferry (Financial District). Bayonne the best commute to Lower Manhattan up to 33rd street Path train.

The space
Two brand new beds; one king, one queen, plus a roll away if needed. New linens. Cable TV with all premium channels and high speed internet and WiFi. Parking available. Bayonne has the best public transportation new NYC. One bus direct to Manhattan, or to Jersey City, or the light rail 5 minute walk. Or, drive to Porte Liberte and take the fantastic ferry straight to the financial district. Look at a map, it is about 2 miles to Manhattan as the crow flys. You will love Bayonne. Great cafe right across the street. Grocery
neighborhood_overview:
Bayonne is the home to the largest park in Northern New Jersey as wll as many small parks and playgrounds. There is lighted basketball, a cushioned running track by the waterfront. At 41st and Ave B there are about 10 beautiful public tennis courts. There is a public pool at 16th street.

The Forum Gym is fantastic and there is a NY Sports club with an indoor pool. There are public and private gold courses close by.

The Newport Mall is large, nice and a short bus or light rail ride away.

Plus of course, Manhattan.

Bayonne is a very safe community. The police are very serious here so historically crime is very low.

neighborhood_overview:
Small Private room with shared bathroom, kitchen, living room. Very cozy atmosphere. FIRM mattress. Dont judge a book by the cover, neighborhood may appear sketchy but it is safe and
VERY quiet. Our house is a diamond in the rough for people on a budget so do not hesitate to book, you will be pleasantly surprised! Don’t be intimidated by some abandoned houses and “homeless”people (they are harmless) in this up and coming area which is undergoing redevelopment by property investors and will soon be revamped. Transportation to Newark Penn Station is available by bus which takes 15 minutes and the bus stop is steps away on the corner of the street. Do not listen to Taxi or Uber Drivers regarding safety issues in our area. It is exaggerated and untrue these are issues of the past and racist comments. A lot of things have changed for the better in Irvington and Newark. Lots of restaurants, pharmacy and grocery store within walking distance.

host_about:
Hi! We are Alicia & Mike and this is our 33BNB! We hope that you love it as much as we do!
Mike is Bayonne born and bred. After moving away for college and living in other towns, he decided to head back to his hometown to plant roots and raise his family. Living on the same block that he grew up on, this history buff and storyteller can give you the low down on Hudson county just as easily as telling you the best ways to get around. 
Alicia is an expat who grew up in South Louisiana and moved across the country to marry her soulmate, Mike! She didn’t leave behind her Southern charm or sassy class though, but she is Bayonne proud and loves her hometown. Count on her to let you know about the best places to shop, eat, have a cocktail, bike ride, or family friendly activities.

Friendly neighborhood..... Walk 2 blocks to many known franchises (KFC, McDonalds, Subway) or many bus stops.


Some of the reviews about the neighborhood are old.
The area is safe. There are few bad folks like in every big city.
The area is being revitalized.
People around here are friendly. Don't be surprised if someone says "Good morning" or tries to help you.
Take a tour around Irvington by doing a search on "City of Irvington tax collector NJ". You will see a street view map. Please click on it and take a virtual tour.

Getting around is easy since there are many options. This is a central location with easy access to all major highways and public transportation.

host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.
Limon and Costa Rica are very friendly places.  So, is Irvington, NJ, USA.

We love to provide excellent service and to excel in everything we do.

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is really quiet, safe and diverse (American, Portuguese, Brazilian and Latin American). Trust me, you will need a nice and quiet place to rest after you are done exploring New York City. There's a Walgreens across from the house to buy basic items and a Dunkin Donuts for a quick breakfast.
host_about:
Let me start by saying, thank you for considering our listings.

We are passionate about the guest experience. We stay in each listing from time to time so we can feel what our guests feel and make sure our guests have the best experience possible. Our improvement to do list is never ending. We take the time to address all of our guests concerns and make their stay as comfortable as possible.

Our company, BESTCITYROOM, com has its own website, IG @ BESTCITYROOM and (Hidden by Airbnb) page BESTCITYROOM where you can find more information about us and reach us for host consulting, Airbnb investments, monetizing Timeshares and doing Airbnb remotely worldwide.

We are always on the move and only a few guests get to know us personally. However, if you would to meet us we will make sure to have you down in our calendar :-)

We have been to many countries and endless cities. We have travel for over 20 years, fluent on 6 languages. There's a big probability we have been to where you come from and have gone where you going next, so feel free to ask for traveling advice.

Thank you for your business and keep traveling/exploring until its your time to rest.

name: Fabulous Functional Bedroom 30 min to NYC
description:
This is a furnished one bedroom within a three bedroom apartment. Room is for ONE GUEST ONLY. Bayonne is a very safe & quiet area. Bus to NYC is at corner or train to New York City is a 5-minute walk- to take you to a connecting train into NYC. It takes about 30 minutes to get into World Trade Center. Property is located 2 blocks from large county park with waterfront bicycle routes, tennis courts, supermarkets, banks, restaurants. Area is extremely walk-able.

The space
The space has been newly renovated and is modern, with 2 newly installed windows for a fresh breeze (with blinds for privacy). Also has air conditioning. Bedroom has a high quality firm twin bed, a closet, large amoire dresser, night table, chair, lamp and overhead lighting and hard wood mahogany floors. Space is cozy & clean and perfect for a short term stay. Fresh linens and towels. Photos don't fully capture the unique beauty of this bedroom. This is for one guest only.The bedroom is within
neighborhood_overview:
Very Safe area. Easily Accessible to New York City. Be careful if your looking in Jersey City, which is a little bit closer to New York City, but many areas are NOT SAFE. Bayonne has an eclectic mix of people, and is a generally quiet neighborhood. Lots of good food nearby: Chinese food, Pizza Masters and Mona Lisa are two of my favorites, Mama Rosa Restaurant is another great cozy restaurant located a few blocks from property.
Quick Check convenience store is 1 block from property, 24 hour 7-11 convenience store is a five- minute walk. Tailor, laundry, a large well stocked supermarket (Shoprite), municipal swimming pool, banks, beauty shop & nail salon, Lowes, Walmart, movie theater, Starbucks and dentists are all in town! Getting around- every thing you might need is within walking distance. Large county park and tennis courts are a few blocks away. If you have a car, you will be provided with a parking pass, and there is adequate street parking near property.
host_about:
Hello, I am a health care consultant performing work throughout New York City and New Jersey. I Love bike riding, gardening, cooking and traveling! 
I had many bad experiences in the past in some Airbnb places and hostels  as a guest, so, now, as a Host, I know exactly how to treat my guests, what they need and how to  ensure EVERY guest who stays with me has  an awesome experience here in New York City.  Cleanliness is extremely important to anyone traveling. I maintain the property in immaculate condition.  There are always clean fresh linens & towels for the use of guests.

neighborhood_overview:
Some of the reviews about the neighborhood are old.
The area is safe. There are few bad folks like in every big city.
The area is being revitalized.
People around here are friendly. Don't be surprised if someone says "Good morning" or tries to help you.
Take a tour around Irvington by doing a search on "City of Irvington tax collector NJ". You will see a street view map. Please click on it and take a virtual tour.

Getting around is easy since there are many options. This is a central location with easy access to all major highways and public transportation.
Please do a search using “248 Orange ave, Irvington, NJ” as your starting point and click on street view.
host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.
Limon and Costa Rica are very friendly places.  So, is Irvington, NJ, USA.

We love to provide excellent service and to excel in everything we do.

If we please you, tell many friends...If we miss our goal, please tell me..
:)  :)  :)

 I love to make new friends, good food, to explore new places and have fun.    
Please contact me if you are planning to explore NYC, NJ,  or Costa Rica.
 
We will have a great time.... Once you are here...You are family!

If you fly into Newark Airport (EWR) and staying at least 7 days,  Book an UBER or Lyft taxi and send photo of bill for refund (Up to $10).   

Also, I love to ski ...Poconos Skiing resort is 50 minutes away.  You can learn  to Ski ,Snowboard, or just slide down the slopes here!!!

Thanks!!!

host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.
Limon and Costa Rica are very friendly places.  So, is Irvington, NJ, USA.

We love to provide excellent service and to excel in everything we do.

If we please you, tell many friends...If we miss our goal, please tell me..
:)  :)  :)

 I love to make new friends, good food, to explore new places and have fun.    
Please contact me if you are planning to explore NYC, NJ,  or Costa Rica.
 
We will have a great time.... Once you are here...You are family!

If you fly into Newark Airport (EWR) and staying at least 7 days,  Book an UBER or Lyft taxi and send photo of bill for refund (Up to $10).   

Also, I love to ski ...Poconos Skiing resort is 50 minutes away.  You can learn  to Ski ,Snowboard, or just slide down the slopes here!!!

Thanks!!!

description:
Budget friendly accommodation, SOFA in the living room of a comfortable 2 bedroom apartment. Shares Kitchenette/Dinning Room & Living Room. Express bus from the house straight to Time Square 42st & 8ave PLEASE KEEP READING ⬇️ FASTER than subway ride from BK or Queens. 5 minutes from Newark Airport, Kean University, Beth Israel Hospital, 15 minutes from Prudential & Harrison Red Bull Arena. Our promise: EASY automated self-check-in, clean, safe & we NEVER cancel :-)

The space
Comfortable SOFA bed located in the living room of a 2 bedroom apartment in the lower level of a home, has access to a kitchenette, BBQ grill in case you want to BBQ and 1 shared bathroom. The most budget-friendly listing, perfect for solo travelers, backpackers & quick airport layover. Sofa bed is twin size. The living room has a TV with NETFLIX or Amazon. Don't forget to read the amenity list for more details.

2 miles from Beth Israel HospitaL. 4 miles from Newark International A
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is really quiet, safe and diverse (American, Portuguese, Brazilian and Latin American). Trust me, you will need a nice and quiet place to rest after you are done exploring New York City. There's a Walgreens across from the house to buy basic items and a Dunkin Donuts for a quick breakfast.
host_about:
Let me start by saying, thank you for considering our listings.

We are passionate about the guest experience. We stay in each listing from time to time so we can feel what our guests feel and make sure our guests have the best experience possible. Our improvement to do list is never ending. We take the time to address all of our guests concerns and make their stay as comfortable as possible.

Our company, BESTCITYROOM, com has its own website, IG @ BESTCITYROOM and (Hidden by Airbnb) page BESTCITYROOM where you can find more information about us and reach us for host consulting, Airbnb investments, monetizing Timeshares and doing Airbnb remotely worldwide.

We are always on the move and only a few guests get to know us personally. However, if you would to meet us we will make sure to have you down in our calendar :-)

We have been to many countries and endless cities. We have travel for over 20 years, fluent on 6 languages. There's a big probability we have been to where you come from and have gone where you going next, so feel free to ask for traveling advice.

Thank you for your business and keep traveling/exploring until its your time to rest.

name: Vibrant 1 bedroom apartment, 20 minutes from NYC
description:
Bayonne is an up and coming suburb of the NYC area. We are centrally located to everything - Cape Liberty Cruise Port is a 5 minute drive, Newark airport is a 15 minute drive, and downtown Manhattan is about a 30 minute drive away (15 without traffic! But there’s always traffic). Bus routes and light rail access are less than 5 blocks away. Whether you choose to stay Jersey-side, or venture into Manhattan, there are endless places to explore. Come be our guest!

The space
This airy 1 bedroom apartment is on the second floor of our home. It features 1 full bathroom, a full kitchen, and an office off of the bedroom. The bedroom features a king size bed and our living area provides a futon you can use for an additional guest.

Guest access
You will have full private access to the second floor space. There is a third floor above where access will be restricted as we are renovating (not while you are here of course!)

Other things to
neighborhood_overview: Our home is walking distance from public transportation, coffee shops, restaurants, and corner stores. The light rail is 5 blocks away from our home, which can take you into downtown Bayonne, Jersey City, Hoboken, and NYC. Additionally there are several bus stops as close as a block away. Sidewalks are abundant throughout Bayonne if walking around is your jam.
host_about: Hi there! I'm Natalia and I am currently residing in New Jersey where I work as an RN in Jersey City. I love to travel, read, run, hike and ski, and I love a good adventure!

Our company, BESTCITYROOM, com has its own website, IG @ BESTCITYROOM and (Hidden by Airbnb) page BESTCITYROOM where you can find more information about us and reach us for host consulting, Airbnb investments, monetizing Timeshares and doing Airbnb remotely worldwide.

We are always on the move and only a few guests get to know us personally. However, if you would to meet us we will make sure to have you down in our calendar :-)

We have been to many countries and endless cities. We have travel for over 20 years, fluent on 6 languages. There's a big probability we have been to where you come from and have gone where you going next, so feel free to ask for traveling advice.

Thank you for your business and keep traveling/exploring until its your time to rest.

neighborhood_overview:
Kearny is such a quiet town that I love for how close it is to everything while away from all the noice and busy life of big cities. Just step outside and within a couple of seconds you'll hear birds chirping and empty streets.
Just around the corner down the hill about half block away in Bergen Ave, you'll find the freshest fruits in all town at the Farmer's Market. Next door it's a dollar store followed by my favorite Seafood restaurant (Hook and Reel) If you're into seafood, you must go and check it out. Then if you look down the hill, you'll see the local Applebee's sitting next to a Burger King, an Ultra Store(the biggest I've ever seen - by far), LA fitness and Starbucks on the other end.
In other words, most of what you'll need during your stay it's just 5-10min walk away from this house. Shop Rite is on the other end of the commercial center if you feel like making just a one stop purchase for all your groceries.

name: Habitación luminosa, 25 min. New Yok
description:
Habitación muy confortable, luminosa, alegre en el mejor lugar de Harrison. A 8 minutos caminando del Path Train y a 25 minutos de NY. Ideal para los que trabajan en casa o viajeros que van a New York. Lugar donde hay absoluta tranquilidad. Cerca de tiendas, restaurantes, colegios. A 10 minutos de Walmart y estadio Red Bull. Ambiente de relax, acogedor y céntrico, a 25 minutos de la gran manzana.

The space
Es una casa de dos familias. Esta bien conservada, tiene áreas verdes en la entrada y en la parte de atrás.

Guest access
Se entra por la puerta principal, que es independiente. Se acceden a los pasadizos comunes.

Other things to note
La habitación es privada. Solo se comparte el baño, con otros huéspedes. Queda a 6 gradas bajo el primer piso. Tiene microhonda, mini frigider, cafetera, hervidor de agua, café, azúcar, plato y cubiertos.
neighborhood_overview: Estamos ubicados en la avenida mas hermosa de Harrison. Esta es la zona mas residencial. Esta rodeado de gran vegetación, arboles y casas bien arregladas.  A tres cuadras esta el gran parque de West Hudson Park, que tiene un lago para pescar. Ideal para la familia.  La casa es muy limpia,  la habitación tiene ventanas que dan a la avenida Davis. Ideal para hacer trabajos, estudiar tranquilamente o para  turistas. Estamos a solo 25 minutos de Manhattan y a 8 minutos caminando del Path Train, y del famoso estadio Red Bull. Hay restaurantes que le dan un aire alegre y divertido a este lugar. Vengan y disfruten de este afamado, histórico y tranquilo  pueblo de Harrison. Ofrecemos cafetera, filtro y un rico y sabroso cafe americano.
host_about: Me encanta ofrecer un lugar tranquilo y confortable, para el huésped. Que se sienta como en casa. Le doy la bienvenida y que disfruten su estancia en este lugar.

name: Apartment in Harrison, NJ.
description: Welcome to this beautiful and modern apartment / 1-bedroom located in a newly built luxury building. Enjoy your stay in this home away from home located in the near downtown Newark and close to Newark International Airport.
neighborhood_overview:
Harrison’s location along the banks of the Passaic River just north of Newark makes it an appealing alternative to living in the big city. Harrison’s charm is inescapable thanks to its tidy streets and diverse neighborhoods. The city’s relatively small population sticks together as a tightly knit community while transportation options make commuting to work relatively easy.

Development along the riverfront and construction of new multi-use buildings and apartments are providing renters with a vibrant new image of Harrison. The rest of the city is made up of charming residential areas with well-maintained homes and buildings. Harrison’s relatively low crime rate, close proximity to Newark and Jersey City, and its access to public transportation are combining to make this an up-and-coming area in the tri-state area.

neighborhood_overview:
"La Casa Harrison”.

Harrison is a lovely residential area, transportation hub, and one of the hottest trending areas of in Hudson county New Jersey! Everything is within walking distance, and centrally located with access to shops, food, and trendy restaurants. The Harrison NY/NJ Path train to NYC is just 5 minute walk from the house. You get easy Direct access to downtown Manhattan (Freedom Tower/Oculus,) midtown Manhattan 33rd street (Macys Herald square)

Harrison Plaza shops within 3 mins walk from the apartment: Includes: Seabra’s supermarket, 24 hour Quickchek convenience store, UPS Store Dunkin Donuts, Walgreens & many restaurants.

There are additional restaurants and shops on Harrison Avenue just three blocks away. Easily uber or drive to Walmart which is just a 5 minute drive, and a 5 minute Uber to Trendy Ironbound. You’ll love my place because of proximity to NYC, walking distance to restaurants and easy access to venues like Prudenti
host_about:
A little about me: I'm born and raised in New York.  I wanted to open my space to others:  a unique space to enjoy the NYC metropolitan area.  There is so much diversity, culture, food, and experiences to enjoy.  

I'm an easy going  and love to travel, meet new people and enjoy the world. I often travel for work, thus leaving my apartment available to guests visiting the area (Jersey City, New York City, Newark, etc.)

I joined AirBnB as it seemed to be a perfect fit for my lifestyle & the flexibility that it offers both guests and hosts. For fun, my favorite things in the world are traveling abroard, music, theatre arts, live stand up comedy and NBA Basketball. I especially love the outdoors, camping and clear blue water with white sand beaches.

I have a passion for doing new things, and this is why I decided to host on Airbnb.   I hope by sharing my space: your trip is made just a little more enjoyable.  Have an AMAZING Day!

name: House in Harrison Near NYC
description:
Nice house near NYC!

Three bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms. Also includes living room, dining room, kitchen, and access to laundry upon request.

15 minute walk from the PATH train which can take you downtown in 20 minutes or near midtown in 35 minutes.

Plenty of restaurants in the area - also there is a large park (west Hudson park) about half a mile or less away.

The space
Bedroom one has a bunk bed with twin mattresses (top and bottom) - ideal for children! There is also a daybed (twin mattress).

Bedroom two has a queen bed.

Bedroom/office 3: You can put a pack and play in here or a twin mattress on the floor.

Living area includes two couches, a dining room, a full kitchen, and a large AC unit for that whole floor. Laundry is also accessible in the basement.

To sum up, the house has: 1 queen beds (counting the futon) and up to 4 twin beds.

Guest access
The neighborho
neighborhood_overview: The house is just under a mile from the PATH station (about 18 minute walk) which can take you downtown (20 min. train ride) or to midtown (35-40 min. train ride). There is lots of good food literally around the corner from the house (Pizza/Italian place, Peruvian chicken, Chinese, etc.). There are also several playgrounds and a nice park (East Hudson Park) for running or walking in.
host_about:
My wife and I own The Abbey in Leadville, Colorado. We have five children under ten, so life is exciting! We hope you will consider coming to stay with us if you travel through the CO mountains.

We have a variety of room options for you to choose from. You can also choose to interact with our kids as little as you like - most of the guest rooms are along a back hallway that is more private. We also have common areas you can use, but you will likely run into our family now and then if you use them frequently.

For my day job, I teach economics at a small Christian liberal arts college in Manhattan called The King's College.

name: Traveler's Haven (30 minutes from NYC )
description:
Welcome! Travelers' Haven is an ideal location for anyone who is looking to be near New York but don't want to deal with the loud sounds and hustle and bustle of the city. This is an extremely clean one-bedroom apartment on the first level. 15 minute drive from American Dream and 12 minutes from Penn Station Newark, 10 minute drive to the Metlife Stadium. 20 mins from Airport. Close to great restaurants, Montclair, NJPAC, Red Bull Stadium, and The Prudential Arts Center.

The space
Street PARKING IN FRONT. The apartment is clean, minimalist, and comfortable. The space is conductive for a party of 2 only. I have a spare air mattress if a 3rd person stays. bus stop right in front That takes you to NYC busses and Penn Station
host_about:
Hello!


My name is Nina. I work in the philanthropic sector. The company I work for supports organizations that are on the frontlines of social justice, fighting inequality domestically and internationally. I am a Communications Associate and lifestyle content creator. I love traveling and photography. I truly enjoy hosting and will do anything to make your experience as enjoyable as possible. 

If you want to know the best places to eat, workout, hike, swim or anything related to the arts, I'm your girl!

I'm a host and an Airbnb guest so I know what a reasonable and unreasonable request is. I want no drama but if you need anything don't hesitate. We have had so many issues when traveling internationally (things happen), things out of our control. You learn to roll with the punches. I've also had amazing experience.  I'm here to make your stay a pleasant one.

* I always leave an honest review because I understand how important reviews are for both host and guests. 

Thank you for stopping by.
