host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.
Limon and Costa Rica are very friendly places.  So, is Irvington, NJ, USA.

We love to provide excellent service and to excel in everything we do.

If we please you, tell many friends...If we miss our goal, please tell me..
:)  :)  :)

 I love to make new friends, good food, to explore new places and have fun.    
Please contact me if you are planning to explore NYC, NJ,  or Costa Rica.
 
We will have a great time.... Once you are here...You are family!

If you fly into Newark Airport (EWR) and staying at least 7 days,  Book an UBER or Lyft taxi and send photo of bill for refund (Up to $10).   

Also, I love to ski ...Poconos Skiing resort is 50 minutes away.  You can learn  to Ski ,Snowboard, or just slide down the slopes here!!!

Thanks!!!

Cozy bathroom with tiled stand up shower, soap dispenser, fresh towels and washcloths. A/C’s in each room, first Aid kit in living space closet. USB ports located throughout the suite. This space can accommodate up to four guests. There is

host_about: Originally from Brooklyn, now residing in New Jersey . I love traveling and was a late bloomer so I try to do it as much as possible. I collect magnets from my trips. My motto is "I don't know everything I want in life, but I know for certain the things I don't want."

host_about:
Hi  This is Mario!    

Look no further... 
We have an excellent support team for great stays  and nice places! 
We add new things  weekly...

I made it from NYC (Port Authority 8th Ave and 42 Street to Irvington with bus # 107X in 20 minutes when there is little traffic. 

Also,  We provide excellent WiFi and 2 WIFI networks at each house.

You may want to try downloading ROKU app for use on our Roku smart TVs.

We use door codes.  No keys needs.
We change codes after each guest leaves.

I'm giving you $5 off each of your first 4 Uber rides. To accept, use code 'marioc2038ue' to sign up. Enjoy! Details:  uber site  and  invite  and marioc2038ue

I'm originally from Costa Rica.   My Grand parents moved from Jamaica to  Limon, Costa Rica to work on building a railroad  to San Jose 100 years ago.
Limon and Costa Rica are very friendly places.  So, is Irvington, NJ, USA.

We love to provide excellent service and to excel in everything we do.

If we please you, tell many friends...If we miss our goal, please tell me..
:)  :)  :)

 I love to make new friends, good food, to explore new places and have fun.    
Please contact me if you are planning to explore NYC, NJ,  or Costa Rica.
 
We will have a great time.... Once you are here...You are family!

If you fly into Newark Airport (EWR) and staying at least 7 days,  Book an UBER or Lyft taxi and send photo of bill for refund (Up to $10).   

Also, I love to ski ...Poconos Skiing resort is 50 minutes away.  You can learn  to Ski ,Snowboard, or just slide down the slopes here!!!

Thanks!!!

description:
Private ground floor studio with private entrance located just 10 miles from NYC and 6 miles from MetLife Stadium. Queen size sleeper, full bathroom w/stand-up shower, fridge, microwave oven, coffee maker, wifi, and free parking.

The space
Private ground floor studio with private entrance located just 10 miles from NYC and 6 miles from MetLife Stadium. Queen size sleeper, full bathroom w/stand-up shower, fridge, microwave oven, coffee maker, wifi, and free parking.

The space itself is bright and open with tons of sunlight during the day. We have everything you need to make your stay as easy and convenient as possible. Large queen-size sleeper with soft and warm down comforter. The space is perfect for two guests. We can accommodate a third person on an air mattress. There is plenty of closet space for your belongings as well. The kitchen area includes: Microwave oven, large size refrigerator, coffee maker, and all silverware and cookware you'
neighborhood_overview:
It's super easy to access all major roadways and getting into Manhattan is a breeze. Here are several points of interest and their distance from our place:

Harrison Path Train Station (2.5 miles)
Red Bull Arena (2.8 miles)

Prudential Center - Newark (4 miles)

We have been to many countries and endless cities. We have travel for over 20 years, fluent on 6 languages. There's a big probability we have been to where you come from and have gone where you going next, so feel free to ask for traveling advice.

Our entire ground level has been newly renovated, 12 foot ceiling, it's including 3 amazing bedroom, and 1 bathroom, back yard full of plants and all kinds of flower, it's located in Bayonne, NJ. this town is like a little peninsula located b/w Staten Island NY and Jersey City NJ. This urban dwelling gives you all of the comforts and conveniences of being in the city. Everything is within walking distance with a short commute to New York City or the Statue of Liberty and Liberty Science center.

The space
this place is the perfect for after a day of sightseeing and shopping! Our place is good for families (with kids), couples and groups. This luxury 3 Bedroom ground floor apartment features WIFI, kitchenware, assential things and everything else you need to enjoy your home away from home.
* 55” Flat screen Smart HD TV/with verizon fios channel
* Modern half Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances
* Kitchenware, Pots, Pans, toaster, over the range
neighborhood_overview:
very big shopping center is right behind the house, walk along 54th street you will find Twin City Plaza. you will find, Aqui Market, Walgreens Pharmacy, Broadway Dinner, Chandelier Catering, rite aid, Dunkin Donuts, retro Fitness, taco bell, twin city liquor, discount depot, T-Mobile store, popeyes, Hudson Lanes (bowling lanes), Wendy's and laundromat Factory.

Famous Park close by is: Richard A. Rutkowski Park
Famous for beautiful scenery and quiet tranquility.
some historic artifacts and wildlife info throughout the trails as well. Along Bayonne's western river shore this park counting with sport fields, BBQ and picnics area under the canopy, bikes track, wooden walkway over a well maintain natural marsh, with the possibility of wild birds observation, is one of the most attractive place in the city.

name: Cozy Colonial only minutes to NYC
description:
Welcome to our beautiful 1930's colonial home. It comfortably accommodates 10 people. It has 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms. It has a beautiful tiger wood staircase leading to the 2nd and 3rd floors. Oversized master suite on 3rd floor.

FYI: There is additional room space for parties larger than 8, please inquire if interested.

The space
This lovely 1930's oversized 3 story colonial has a lovely front porch with a swing to welcome you. Upon entry to the lovely home, you are greeted by a beautiful original tiger wood staircase and 10 in ceilings. You can either leave the pocket doors open allowing the cozy living room to overflow into the dining room, or close the doors while enjoying a lovely dinner around the fireplace while adoring the waffle ceilings. The kitchen is large with all modern appliances as well as beautiful granite counter tops. There is a half bath located off from the kitchen. The second floor has 3 spacious bedrooms and a full bathro

name: 6Brm/3Bath Quiet Home Near NY City Parking Wi-Fi
description:
3-Story House. Quiet residential neighborhood, proximity to NY City & EWR. Bayonne, NJ. Excellent for families, groups, business professionals/home-office. Convenient access to NY City. Uber to PATH train to go to World Trade Center or walk to Bus Stop to go to NYC. 1.5 mi to Light Rail. Convenience store/food/24-hr-restaurant/rental car nearby. Park Free. 24hr Smart Check-In. AC/Heating. Total 3bath/6Brm 10 beds in Flr-1 & 2. No beds in Gr Flr but has mini-bar (BYOB).

The space
1. Located wonderfully close to NYC yet in a quiet and safe neighborhood. Driveway parking just in the front inside the house premises. This 3-story House is all yours with private entrance. Access Gr flr through flr-1 kitchen.

The house must be booked in total. Not possible to book any part separately.

Convenient electronic smart-check-in and check-out. Electronic locks - iPhone, Samsung, Pixel phone compatible.

This is a sleepy town just across Hudson River from Manhattan, popular for quiet residential neighborhood yet readily and conveniently accessible to all the action in NYC.

Just 30 minutes to everywhere! Of course, at off-peak hours. See commuting details elsewhere or ask host.
